description: Red Hat has identified an AWS instance issue that may impact your cluster. The instance '${INSTANCE_ID}' is currently in a 'shutting-down' state for an extended period of time. This condition normally resolves itself in a few hours. Refer to the AWS instance shutdown troubleshooting documentation for more information: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/TroubleshootingInstancesShuttingDown.html#instance-stuck-terminating.
